subject: Communication
title: AI and the Future of Storytelling
description: A short lesson to help you apply AI and the Future of Storytelling.

hook.text: An AI wrote a short film that premiered at a film festival. Critics couldn't tell it wasn't human-written.

buildup.text: Large language models can generate plots, dialogue, and entire scripts ‚Äî but can they create meaning?

discovery.text: AI excels at pattern matching: it can replicate story structures. It struggles with originality and lived experience.

twist.text: The real shift isn't AI replacing storytellers ‚Äî it's AI as a co-creator, generating drafts humans refine.

climax.text: What makes stories powerful isn't just structure ‚Äî it's the human experience behind them. That can't be generated.

punchline.text: AI can tell stories. Only humans can mean them.

quiz.question: What is AI's primary limitation in storytelling?
options: It lacks originality and lived experience
